title: Application Class
description: The application that will be added to the portal.

constructors.title: constructor()
constructors.description: Initializes a new instance of application.

fields.title: error: Error
fields.description: The error occurs while loading. <mark>null</mark> if the application does not get any error while load.

events.title: onOpen: EventRegister<(this: Application) => void>
events.description: Occur when the portal opens this application.
